title: 200,000T fuel so far delivered to Sri Lanka from India
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The fourth consignment of fuel from India was delivered today (02) under the US$ 500 million credit line from India.
The Indian High Commission stated that a consignment of 40,000 MT of diesel under Indian assistance was handed over to the Minister of Energy, Gamini Lokuge.
First major food aid of 40,000T rice to Sri Lanka from Delhi
Anuradhapura bus drivers haphazardly park in protest of fuel crisis
